mapper.insert: insert into xx_customer (customer_id, first_name, last_name, company, address, city, state, county, postal_code, phone, fax, email, support_repId) values (#{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supportRepid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update xx_customer set first_name = #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_name = #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postal_code = #{postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, support_repId = #{supportRepid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select customer_id, first_name, last_name, company, address, city, state, county, postal_code, phone, fax, email, support_repId from xx_customer where customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
